snippet.title: Big Helmet Heroes - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Meet the Warrior, Rogue, Monk, and Brute playable character classes and see them in action in this Big Helmet Heroes trailer for the upcoming beat 'em all game for solo or 2-player couch co-op. Big Helmet Heroes will be available on Steam, Epic Games Store, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch.
